mapper.select: SELECT B.BRAND_NAME,M.MENU_PIC,MC.CAT_NAME,M.MENU_NAME,M.MENU_PRICE,M.MENU_EXP FROM MENU M JOIN MENU_CATEGORY MC ON (M.CAT_CODE=MC.CAT_CODE) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (M.BRAND_CODE=SI.BRAND_CODE) JOIN BRAND B ON (M.BRAND_CODE= B.BRAND_CODE) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{userId} AND M.MENU_YN='N'

SELECT B.BRAND_NAME,M.MENU_PIC,MC.CAT_NAME,M.MENU_NAME,M.MENU_PRICE,M.MENU_EXP FROM MENU M JOIN MENU_CATEGORY MC ON (M.CAT_CODE=MC.CAT_CODE) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (M.BRAND_CODE=SI.BRAND_CODE) JOIN BRAND B ON (M.BRAND_CODE= B.BRAND_CODE) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{Id} AND MC.CAT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%' AND M.MENU_YN='N'

SELECT B.BRAND_NAME,M.MENU_PIC,MC.CAT_NAME,M.MENU_NAME,M.MENU_PRICE,M.MENU_EXP FROM MENU M JOIN MENU_CATEGORY MC ON (M.CAT_CODE=MC.CAT_CODE) JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON (M.BRAND_CODE=SI.BRAND_CODE) JOIN BRAND B ON (M.BRAND_CODE= B.BRAND_CODE) WHERE SI.USER_ID=#{Id} AND M.MENU_NAME LIKE '%'||#{menuName}||'%' AND M.MENU_YN='N'
